long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The X Downloader Extension, your effortless solution for saving Twitter videos directly to your as MP4 and MP3. This user-friendly browser add-on is absolutely free and designed to simplify your video downloads from Twitter and Tweetdeck.

With X Downloader, capturing videos from tweets is a snap. After a quick setup, you'll notice a new button added to Twitter videos, ready for you to start the download in just one click. No technical skills needed at all.

X Downloader isn't just for the main Twitter platform. It's fully compatible with Tweetdeck, ensuring your Twitter management is coupled with easy video saving.

Get started on making any Twitter video available offline with X Downloader. It's ideal for every Twitter fan or anyone who loves to watch Twitter moments again and again.

Check out how it works with our online demo right now at: https://x-downloader.com
